title: CRONUS - WC
author: CRONUS - WC
content: Welcome to WallaCoin!We are currently finalising the details of the whitepaper, which you will find on our discord server over the next week. We leave you a sneak peek on what the project consists of and who we are.We are in the process of setting up a company made up of a total of 6 partners. Within these 6 partners, we have experts in finance, IT, negotiation and digital marketing. Our main objective is to create a platform (website under construction) where all users can buy and sell products both first and second hand, where the payment method is our currency, WallaCoin. The initial idea is to operate during the first phase of the project only at the European level, but we are already negotiating to take it on an international scale. If you are interested on the project, you will find more information on the ðŸ“ˆâ”‚pre-sale channel on our discord server.Discord: https://discord.gg/XYqrjc6qVSWe leave below the banner that we will use in Ihostmn and many other platforms to advertise WallaCoin.https://imgur.com/a/lGfiS7n

comments.author: CryptoGM
comments.body: Hello,Would you be interested to place your banner ad with us (coinweez.com)? or better still publish a press release about your upcoming pre-sale. Contact me on Telegram @ICO_Services or contact@coinweez.com
